item.title: Django Notes
item.author: Author
item.description: Start the Django project (foo as the project name and bar as the app name) The admin site The Django shell (Control-d to exit) Making pages References Start the Django project (foo as the project name and bar as the app name) Create a virtual environment (where we can install packages and isolate them from all other packages): (venv is the virtual environment module.) 1 python3 -m venv foo Activate the virtual environment: (Packages inside will be available only when the environment is active.
